page.title: 06CORBET DRIVE HOUSING ESTATE
page.content: The estate isn't very old all the houses are 5 years old.The brick work is new and all the road is tarmac even the paths are.Across the road from our house there is the village green,the hall and bowling green. The estate is clean and quiet but when the boys come out it isn't all that quiet.Everybody there is friendly and most of the children are playful there is 1 house for sale. There are 12 houses and 5 bungalows and there are 3 different designs of buildings.Seventeen families live on the estate.In our survey we were surprised to find out only one family is local.All the others have moved from towns many miles from Adderley like Manchester, Lowestoft,Bristol,Newcastle upon Tyne and Harlow.
